description:
My place is close to Chelsea Market and Westville Chelsea. You’ll love my place because of the location, the neighborhood and the plethora of local shops and restaurants around. 

The apartment is located on the 5th floor of a walk up building. So you'll get your exercise in as well!

Quiet hours: midnight-8am
Bed size: Full
name: Tranquility in the Heart of NYC!
review: Top value accomodation in the heart of Manhattan. The house is quite clean and very confortable, cozy for two or three people. There are all the amenities you will need for a quick meal. Stuff is new and very clean. The stairs are not so  challenging, even with a large lugage. Most important, the ouse is close to subway linse 123 and ace, making easy to reach every spott in NYC. There are a lot of cool pkaces and bars nearby. Chelsea market is a great place to eat. You will apreciate the peace in this building. Only one problem: there is a kind of wather tube that make little noise somewhen in the night for few minutes. If you are  going for a peacefull sleep and do not use earplugs maybe you will be scarried during your dreams. Bythaway Alex provides earplugs.
